import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbActiveModal } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-in', templateUrl: './sign-in.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sign-in.component.css'] }) export class SignInComponent { constructor(private activeModal: NgbActiveModal) { } closeModal() { this.activeModal.close('Modal Closed'); } }
